pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package pulls in various gstreamer plugins based on USE flags. It's intended to be used as a runtime-depend for apps that need various gstreamer plugins. This will allow USE flags to be changed without re-compiling apps, since gstreamer plugins are all run-time dependencies.

use.flag: Fallback to CPU based AV1 video support
Fallback to the slower CPU based reference AV1 codec
AAC audio support via FAAC (encoder) and FAAD (decoder)
Fallback to an optimized CPU based AV1 decoder
Decode support for ffmpeg supported formats
Fallback to CPU based JPEG image support
Fallback to CPU based MPEG2 video support
Enable hardware accelerated AV1, H.264, H.265, JPEG, VP8, VP9, resize for NVIDIA® GPUs.
Fallback to a CPU based H.264 codec.
Enable hardware accelerated AV1, H.264, H.265, JPEG, VP9 for Intel® supported CPUs or GPUs.
Fallback to the secure CPU based AV1 encoder

Partial compatibility for libsndfile formats which includes
* Berkeley/IRCAM/CARL * Sphere NIST format * Ensoniq PARIS file format * Midi Sample Dump Standard * Amiga IFF / SVX8 / SV16 format * VOC files * Sonic Foundry's 64 bit RIFF/WAV * Fasttracker 2 Extended Instrument * RF64 WAV file
Lightweight audio and MIDI server support via sndio

Fallback to CPU based VP8/VP9 support.
